explains: adj. 无法律的，不遵守法律的；目无法纪的，不守法的；不受法律约束的

sentences.en: The government recognized there were problems in urban areas but these could never be an excuse for lawless behaviour.
sentences.cn: 政府认识到市区存在问题，但是这绝不能成为非法行为的借口。

sentences.en: It is lawless right now in the Wild West.
sentences.cn: 现在的西部简直无法无天。

sentences.en: Battlefields, though, were not lawless places before this.
sentences.cn: 此前的战场也并非无法无天。
